name: TaptheSounds
0:
”Alexa, open Tap the Sounds”
”Alexa, open Tap the Sounds and pick a cvc word”
”Alexa, open Tap the Sounds and give me a cvc word”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: tap the sounds
des: Tap the Sounds was developed with early elementary students in mind to help them practice their CVC (Consonant - Vowel - Consonant) words. Alexa will provide a word and then the students can tap the sounds while sounding out the consonant, vowel, and consonant sounds.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
